name: Nonstop Balls
description:
Nonstop ball-shooting brick-breaking action! Bounce balls around break blocks. Relax your brain! This is the ultimate casual game!

Game Features:
- Non-stop actions! This is Ball shooter game on steoriod!
- Upgrade balls and cannon for higher score!
- Collect Power Ups for even more action!
- Customizable Themes!
- Unique Challenge levels!
- Amazing Graphics and Animations
